subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LaMarcus Aldridge and Damian Lillard each scored 25 points and Nicolas Batum added 24 as the Portland Trail Blazers won their sixth straight in overtime at Toronto.
snippet: LaMarcus Aldridge and Damian Lillard each scored 25 points and Nicolas Batum added 24 as the Portland Trail Blazers won their sixth straight in overtime at Toronto.
